text: John Tremelling (28 July 1929 - 15 June 2016) was an Australian sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Australian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Australia Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportsmen from South Australia Category:People from Mount Gambier, South Australia Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in shooting Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Australia Category:Shooters at the 1982 Commonwealth Games
title: John Tremelling
